Meta.title: Equip Modify
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
此mod提供了一个物品[祛魔粉]用其可在[枪身加工机]与任何装备合成, 清除其附魔 且获得[附魔石], 使用[附魔石]则可像改造枪械一样对任何装备或武器添加附魔 附魔槽位上限为15 默认无法为远程武器附魔 清除远程武器附魔需先将其改造卸下 [祛魔粉]配方在[诺拉]处出售
附魔槽位上限与是否允许为远程武器附魔可在BepInEx配置内调整 (如"SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.equipmodify.cfg")
This mod provides an item called [dispel powder], which can be combined with any equipment in the [barrel processing machine] to remove its enchantments. Upon using the [dispel powder], you will receive an [enchant gem]. [enchant gem] can be used to add enchantments to any equipment or weapon, just like modifying firearms. The maximum number of enchantment slots is 15 by default. Enchanting ranged weapons is disabled by default. To remove enchantments from ranged weapons, you must first dismantle the modifications. The recipe for [dispel powder] is sold by [Nola].
The maximum number of enchantment slots and whether to allow enchanting ranged weapons can be adjusted in the BepInEx configuration. (e.g., SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.equipmodify.cfg).
